channel.title: Section 2: Set up your tools on Migrating WordPress to Hugo: Course Reference
channel.description: Recent content in Section 2: Set up your tools on Migrating WordPress to Hugo: Course Reference

item.title: 07 Install Chocolatey Package Manager (Windows Only)
item.description: Site: https://chocolatey.org/install Make sure it works: choco *Don’t forget to run choco commands as an administrator.

item.title: 08 Install Hugo
item.description: https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing Windows: choco install hugo macOS: brew install hugo Ubuntu Linux: sudo apt-get install hugo See the docs above for more complex installs.

item.title: 09 Install Visual Studio Code and Extensions
item.description: https://code.visualstudio.com/ Windows: choco install visualstudiocode Alternate/Manual: https://code.visualstudio.com/download Extensions: Code Spell Checker Markdownlint EditorConfig for VS Code Better TOML

item.title: 10 Installing Git
item.description: Windows: choco install git Windows (Manual): https://git-scm.com/downloads Mac: brew install git Manual: https://git-scm.com/download/mac Linux (Debian-based): sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get upgrade sudo apt-get install git Linux (Red Hat-based): sudo yum upgrade sudo yum install git

item.title: 11 Learning Git
item.description: GitLens: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=eamodio.gitlens Basic Git commands: git status git add . git commit -m “some message” git clone git push git pull Resources for learning Git: https://try.github.io/
